name: Talisman
overview: Talisman is computer adaptation of the board game "Talisman: The Magical Quest" from Games Workshop. Game has 10 characters: Elf, Priest, Assassin, Troll, Warrior, Ghoul, Thief, Wizard, Sorceress and Druid, up to four characters can be in the game - they can be controlled by computer or by real players. The player can move left or right, occasionally he will need to select which location he moves into (north, south, etc). He searches of different things and occasionally fights with monsters Fights are very random: in battle, pressing any key will add a random value, the winning is the greater number.
